ctl:function.name: csw:disjoint-envelopes
ctl:function.ctl:param: The gml:Envelope specifying the area of interest
ctl:function.ctl:return: Returns '1' if the envelopes are disjoint or '0' if they are not (i.e. they intersect). Returns '-1' if the CRS references do not match.
ctl:function.ctl:description: Determines if two envelopes are disjoint. If not, they intersect.

xsl:when.test: ($minX2 gt $maxX1) or ($minY2 gt $maxY1) or ($maxX2 lt $minX1) or ($maxY2 lt $minY1)

ctl:function.name: wrs:disjoint-envelopes
ctl:function.ctl:param: The gml:Envelope specifying the area of interest
ctl:function.ctl:return: Returns '1' if the envelopes are disjoint or '0' if they are not (i.e. they intersect). Returns '-1' if the CRS references do not match.
ctl:function.ctl:description: Determines if two envelopes are disjoint. If not, they intersect.

xsl:when.test: ($minX2 gt $maxX1) or ($minY2 gt $maxY1) or ($maxX2 lt $minX1) or ($maxY2 lt $minY1)

div.p: The behaviour of a WRS catalogue implementation is checked against the following specifications:

ul.li: Web Registry Service (WRS) - Part 1: ebRIM profile of CSW [OGC 07-110r1]
OASIS ebXML Registry Information Model Version 3.0 [regrep-rim-3.0-os]
OpenGIS Geography Markup Language (GML) Implementation Specification, Version 3.1 [OGC 03-105r1,ISO/CD 19136]
WRS Level 0 (Generic CSW): Covers mandatory search and retrieval requests based on the generic csw:Record format.
WRS Level 1 (Minimal Discovery): Covers mandatory search and retrieval requests based on the ebRIM 3.0 information model.
